description: In its appeal to everyone to take special precautions with fires, cigarettes, cigarette lighters, and matches, in forest areas,. this American film shows the shocking damage wrought by forest fires in the USA to forest lands, wild life, live stock, soil and homes. Narrated by Alois Havrillon.
